ygData.subject: Re: Question about dexterity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: The Scotts  To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 2:34 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Scotts <jtscott@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 2:34 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Question about dexterity


>From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>


<deletia>

>Personally I think clerics shopuld not worry abnout mana as much as getting
>there STR up cus face it all of you right now probaly cannot wear full
>bronze even (and this is a big probaly)unless of course you already have
STr
>increasing items.


Ho ho ho, laddie! Ye can wear full bronze if yer a dwarf, ye can! Of course,
ye are limited in the loot ye can carry, which sorely grieves a dwarf, for
we are very fond of gold and gems...

But having gotten me armor up to almost full bronze (at astonishingly low
prices in the small bronze mines of Unrest), I am now in the process of
replacing it with other stuff, that will boost me wisdom. As others have
said, the higher ye go, the less ye melee, and the more yer value to yer
group is in yer buffs and heals.

But having said that, I would not turn down any rubicite if it happened to
come me way, no, I would not...

== Gilead, dwarvin cleric of Fennin Ro
